#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: simpleType StrokeLengthEnum.

== Name ==

*[SStrokeLengthEnum StrokeLengthEnum]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
string
  |
  +--StrokeLengthEnum (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			List of values to specify stroke length in shot quality description.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	('short' | 'middle' | 'long')

----
    <xs:simpleType name="StrokeLengthEnum">  <xs:restriction base="xs:string">    <xs:enumeration value="short"/>    <xs:enumeration value="middle"/>    <xs:enumeration value="long"/>  </xs:restriction></xs:simpleType>
----
